Action.author: muralisr
Action.body: ~greg.haskins The check during instantiate is an existence check. As only one version of a chaincode can be installed on the channel, it merely checks if the named chaincode exists on the channel - and issues an error if it does. I think its working correctly... do let me know if i'm missing anything.

Action.author: greg.haskins
Action.body: Ah! I read that wrong ~muralisr . Very sorry. Will close
